    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize.accesscertifier.TemplateAction

      • findOU

        public static <any> findOU(DAO sql,
                           int listTypeBW,
                           OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                           TemplateBean templateBean,
                           Paging paging)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the organization units associated to template given. It is possible to filter by organization unit. The listTypeBW int parameter is used to specify the type of the list where to search the organization unit. Allowed values are: 0-search into the Black List of organization units, 1-search into the White List of organization units.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        listTypeBW - int parameter used to specify the type of the list where to search the organization units. Allowed values are: 0-search into the Black List of organization units, 1-search into the White List of organization units.
        ouBean - organization unit filter
        templateBean - template filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of organization units found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        @Deprecated
public static void addOU(DAO sql,
                                     int listTypeBW,
                                     boolean hierarchy,
                                     OrgUnitBean ouBean,
                                     TemplateBean templateBean)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. Replaced by {addOU(DAO, int, int, OrgUnitBean, TemplateBean) The method adds the organization unit given to the template given. The listTypeBW int parameter is used to specify the type of the list where to add the organization unit. Allowed values are: 0-add the organization unit to the Black List, 1-add the organization unit to the White List.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        listTypeBW - int parameter used to specify the type of the list where to add the organization unit Allowed values are: 0-add the organization unit to the Black List, 1-add the organization unit to the White List
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the method must add the organization unit punctually or with its hierarchy
        ouBean - organization unit to add, mandatory
        templateBean - template target of the addition, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
